description.narrative: Denmark supported the UN Women's country program for Pakistan based on the Country Note and Annual Work Plan 2014-17. The program aims to eliminate structural gender inequalities and discrimination against women in public life, and address women specific security and economic vulnerabilities which cut across two distinct areas of program and policy making, namely Disaster Risk Reduction and Management (DRR/M) and stabilization and social reconstruction in the aftermath of complex emergencies. The program focuses following outcomes: OUTCOME 1.1 Policy and institutional level responses and coordination mechanisms of relevant national and provincial authorities including women machineries incorporate and promote commitments in natural disasters and complex emergencies OUTCOME 2 Women and girls rights promoted and protected during natural disasters, complex emergencies and social reconstruction processes
